snippet: Joe Vitt will be the interim coach for New Orleans in Sean Payton’s absence but must serve his own six-game suspension in the bounty scandal.
abstract: New Orleans Saints name Joe Vitt as interim coach during head coach Sean Payton's 1-year suspension; Vitt must first serve six-game suspension for his part in the team's bounty program.
lead_paragraph: Joe Vitt will be the interim coach for New Orleans in Sean Payton’s absence but must serve his own six-game suspension in the bounty scandal.

headline.seo: Saints Turn to Vitt to Replace Payton
headline.main: Vitt, Facing Own Ban, Will Fill In for Payton
headline.print_headline: Vitt, Facing Own Ban, Will Fill In for Payton
